00043 #ifndef __OPENCV_GPU_STREAM_ACCESSOR_HPP__
00044 #define __OPENCV_GPU_STREAM_ACCESSOR_HPP__
00045 
00046 #include "opencv2/gpu/gpu.hpp"
00047 #include "cuda_runtime_api.h"
00048 
00049 namespace cv
00050 {
00051     namespace gpu
00052     {
00053         // This is only header file that depends on Cuda. All other headers are independent.
00054         // So if you use OpenCV binaries you do noot need to install Cuda Toolkit.
00055         // But of you wanna use GPU by yourself, may get cuda stream instance using the class below.
00056         // In this case you have to install Cuda Toolkit.
00057         struct StreamAccessor
00058         {
00059             CV_EXPORTS static cudaStream_t getStream(const Stream& stream);
00060         };
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00064 #endif /* __OPENCV_GPU_STREAM_ACCESSOR_HPP__ */
